oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Thomas R. Jones, Sr. correspondence with Mary Mildred Jones, 1944 February 9
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jones, Thomas R., Sr.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from Tommy Jones to his wife, Mary Mildred, in which he discusses cleaning and target practice. He indicates that he might not get pass for day off because of his exhaustive target practice schedule.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Soldiers -- United States -- 20th century -- History; World War, 1939-1945; Basic training (Military education)
Jones, Mary Mildred; Jones, Thomas R., Sr.
United States. Army. Armored Division, 3rd
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Thomas R. Jones, Sr. World War II correspondence
